description: The BenchMixer™ XLQ QuEChERs Shaker/Vortexer is designed for use in QuEChERS and other sample prep methods. Supplied with racks for 50ml tubes held horizontally and 15ml and 1.5/2.0ml tubes held vertically. Multiple samples can be processed simultaneously in the Benchmixer XLQ's large capacity racks. The vigorous, consistent shaking ensures all samples are under the identical conditions within the same batch of samples, as well as between batches.
name: BenchMixer XLQ QuEChERs Shaker
